page.title: 10HEALTH IN HOLBEACH DROVE
page.content: HEALTH IS OF CONCERN IN ALL SITUATIONS BUT IN THE OPEN COUNTRYSIDE FOUND AROUND HOLBEACH DROVE AND FLEET FEN THERE ARE ALOT OF HOMES WHICH ARE ISOLATED AND WHERE MANY OLD FOLK LIVE AND HAVE TO BE CARED FOR. AS FOUND IN THE AREA, PEOPLE TEND TO LOOK AFTER THEIR OLD FOLK AND MAKE SURE THEY ARE WELL CARED FOR AND IF THEY ARE NOT SEEN SOMEONE WILL NOTICE. IF DOCTORS ARE REQUIRED THEY HAVE TO COME OUR FROM THE PRACTICE AT CROWLAND WHERE TWO DOCTORS HOLD SURGERIES. A CHEMIST IS NEXT DOOR TO ONE OF THE SURGERIES AND HE STAYS OPEN UNTIL THE DOCTOR HAS ENDED HIS PRACTICE FOR THE DAY. SOME PRESCRIPTIONS ARE SENT TO THE LOCAL POST OFFICE IN WHAPLODE DROVE TO ENABLE PEOPLE TO GET THEIR TABLETS ETC WITHOUT HAVING TO GO TO CROWLAND.SURGERY IS ALSO HELD IN HOLBEACH/ WHAPLODE.DENTISTS ARE LOCAL.
